data.prayer: Father, we ask for 649 new simple churches in the state of Jambi, Indonesia. Place a simple church in every community of the 3,249,600 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jambi, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 104,260 believers in Jambi to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Jambi, Indonesia.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, let it be said of the 3,145,340 lost in Jambi that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Jambi, Indonesia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Penghulu people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Penghulu people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Penghulu people is yours.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Jambi, Indonesia to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Jambi.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Jambi, Indonesia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

location.name: Jambi
location.cities_list: Jambi City, Sungai Penuh, Mendaha, Simpang, Kuala Tungkal
location.cities_list_w_pop: Jambi City (420,323), Sungai Penuh (95,913), Mendaha (56,268), Simpang (36,652), Kuala Tungkal (33,683)
